oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: 17th Annual Bean Blossom Blues Festival (brown)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: festivals; Bean Blossom (Brown County, Ind.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (red and black on brown) announcing the 17th Annual Bean Blossom Blues Festival with Danielle Nicole, Jarekus Singleton, Jason Ricci, Tas Cru, Mr. Sipp, Brandon Santini, and Mary Bridget Davies at the Bill Monroe Music Park on August 27. Poster features a woodcut of a guitar and harmonica.
